STATEMENT:

What’s your reaction to this situation? Would you be comfortable sharing this information?

Allergies and chronic conditions directly impact emergency care, so full transparency is non-negotiable. The doctor’s persistence, while possibly grating, stems from medical necessity—not curiosity. My comfort isn’t the priority here; survival is. I’d disclose everything relevant without hesitation, trusting their expertise over my momentary unease.
